ProteinName	Thioredoxin domain-containing protein 12 (EC 1.8.4.2) (Endoplasmic reticulum resident protein 18) (ER protein 18) (ERp18) (Endoplasmic reticulum resident protein 19) (ER protein 19) (ERp19) (Thioredoxin-like protein p19) (hTLP19)
GeneName	TXNDC12 TLP19 UNQ713/PRO1376
Length	172
Function	Protein-disulfide reductase of the endoplasmic reticulum that promotes disulfide bond formation in client proteins through its thiol-disulfide oxidase activity.
